name: Jump On The Moles!
description:
See how many moles you can jump on in 30 seconds! Get the highest score and become the best dang Mole-Jumper(TM) you can be!

--------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

W = jump

A/D = left/right, respectively

-------------------------------------------------------------

-Music by: rolemusic. Find out more here: http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/

-Sound FX made with as3sfxr, ChipTone, and BeepBox.co

-Made in GameMaker Studio 2.

"Jump On The Moles" is NOT PETA-approved, obviously. Enjoy!
